features: Material and Size: The carpet has super soft shaggy surface, non-slip plastic spots bottom, makes you feel like lying on the clouds, 4 feet x 5.3 feet / 48 inches x 64 inches, it's available in a choice of colors and sizes

Super Soft Feeling: Our shaggy and fluffy area rugs are elegant in texture and soft to the touch, this fluffy carpet provides a tranquil refuge for your family to rest their body and mind after a hectic day

Multi-purpose: Embellish your floors with this shag rugs, it's a perfect home decor for bedroom, kids room, girls room, nursery room, college dorm living room or study room and harmoniously blend with most floors and furniture

Contracted Style: We are an advocate of minimalist design where every details should be purposeful and direct, we take advantage of the simple line and the single color to interpret the concept of the Modern area rugs
Easy to Clean: Please try to shake off outdoors, hand wash or wipe clean with a wet rag, it's not shrink or fade after wash, airing is under ventilated place, drying machine is not allowed

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Us? 1. What makes this rug so soft? Our fluffy rug features a luxurious, soft high pile and sponge middle layer that gives you a best touch feeling and shields toes from the cold floor. 2. Do these area rugs have non-slip backing? Thousands of tiny, durable plastic spots will help to prevent the carpet from sliding around on your floors. 3. Does this fuzzy rug shed? The tight weaving process ensures that the floor carpet in this area is not easy to fall off and the edges are not easy to fall apart. 4. How do you clean the room rug? Please try to vacuum the area rug with a low-power handheld vacuum, dust and dirt on the surface can be removed easily. For a deep clean, hand wash it with low temperature and gentle detergent. Air dry after washed.

Fluffy Bedroom Rug,Kids Rugs for Bedroom,Super Soft Area Rugs for Living Room Perfect for Any Room: This cute rug creates a comfortable and warm atmosphere.These soft shag area rugs are suitable for girls and boys bedrooms, bedsides, dorms, playrooms, under desks, study table areas, apartments, closets, nurseries. Perfect Gift: This soft rug ideal for friend's house warming gift, Christmas gift and grandson, granddaughter, toddler, little baby girl/boy shower gift.They will love it. Tips: Since this fluffy rug comes with a vacuum Packaging bag, its normal to see the fibers on the rug is not fluffy enough and there will be some creases. Please lay it flat for 2 to 3 days and wait patiently for its recovery. We are sorry for any inconvenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER soft and cozy to lay on. You can't beat it for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I first purchased one of these for my daughter's dorm to go between the beds. 5 minutes later, I decided to purchase another one (because the price was so great!) to go between my other 2 daughter's twin beds- today we received the one for home and it fit perfectly between the 2 beds and my daughters are so happy with the sizing and the color. We purchased the gray color, but this rug comes in so many pretty colors!It does NOT shed at all-of course we just received it today, but we did walk on it quite a bit with our socks on.So, we received the package and it was vacuum packed and once the package was opened it poofed up. The directions said that the bottom underpad would puff up in 1-2 days so we are waiting on that. It is non slip underneath, but I may still buy something to give it a little more added lift to make the underpad seem thicker.All in all, this is so worth it for the money! WE bought the 4 x 5.3. I am so so happy with our purchase so far!Plus I ordered it with Prime on a Saturday and it arrived on a Sunday, the next day! AWESOME!The one I ordered for my daughter's dorm I had shipped directly to her dorm and will be super easy for her to carry back to her room from the mail room because the package is so compact and not real heavy at all. I also ordered that one on Saturday and that is scheduled to arrive 3 days later on Tuesday, which is not back considering her dorm/college is a bit remote. (Our home one probably arrived so quickly because Amazon has a facility like 7 minutes from my home!) :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not good with pets
reviews.reviewText: I bought this with good intention but failed :(If your single with no kids and no pets , then this rug works for you. The rug is soft and I bought the dark purple color which is beautiful in color. If your going to lay it don on the floor I recommend sticking it down with velcro so if you vacuum over it it doesn't get sucked into the vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and look great
reviews.reviewText: It became our center rug in our family room. Great size and felt great. Our pets loved laying on it. Negative thing about it is that it's very hard to wash. Cannot really wash it, dry cleaning is expensive and air drying it makes it lumpy. So cannot get dirty or just spot clean. Cheap enough where I would buy again if it's ruined. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the rug for my daughters bedroom. It is a little bit on the thinner side but its not too thin that you can feel the floor. When you step on it it feels soft and fluffy. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug and gets lots of compliments. It’s big, soft and lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great carpet! But..
reviews.reviewText: Opening the carpet and using it for the first 7 days provided an opportunity to experience a soft, smooth, inviting carpet.Shortly after, it begins to collect all sorts of things. Pet hair, pieces of food, stickers, Cameron’s wig, and paper!Think you can simply use your fancy $50 floor sucker to clean it? Think again! This rug is resistant to vacuum cleaners and even washing machines.To properly clean it without breaking your washer and dryer is to professionally clean it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't shedd and feels comfy!
reviews.reviewText: Got hot pink for my daughters barbie room and it is beautiful! Vacuums nicely with little shedding and is super vibrant!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW, GREAT RUGS, AWESOME PRICE!!!! Highly Recommended!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Super soft, GREAT rugs for a tremendous price! Backing is excellent, non-slip and rugs are top of the line! I ordered 8 rugs and ALL of them are AMAZING! I am SO THRILLED with my purchase. Hot pink for my 5 year old Granddaughter and black for all other rooms. Super soft, nice padding and outstanding price! Delivered within days of order. HIGHLY recommend this Seller!!!!!! 5+ Stars. Thank you, Amazon...you did it again - you're the BEST!!!!!!
